channel.title: Making commands for mods and up

item.title: Making commands for mods and up
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

Exact quote from the Java™ Tutorials:

If the variable name consists of more than one word, capitalize the first letter of each subsequent word.
so "playerrights" should be "playerRights". i also don' t think you have to add "c." before playerRights because the variable isn' t being grabbed from the client.

Read full topic
item.source: Making commands for mods and up

item.title: Making commands for mods and up
item.dc:creator: @Perses_Pkers Perses Pkers
item.description:
@Perses_Pkers wrote:

Heres My WHOLE ::master Command Hope It Helps!
Master Code:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); } } There ya go :P!

Read full topic

item.title: Making commands for mods and up
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

hi guys i made a command ::master and it looks like this

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master")) { c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 1); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 2); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 3); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 4); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 5); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 6); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 7); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 8); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 9); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 10); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 11); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 12); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 13); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 14); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 15); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 16); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 17); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 18); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 19); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 20); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 21); 
		}</blockquote>

so i did this and it worked…but all players can do it i tried entering

&& c.playerrights >=2)
after the first bit but it gave me a compile error can any 1 suggest what i do?

Read full topic
item.source: Making commands for mods and up
